Megapiranha, Swarm

Within this mass of primeval fish glint innumerable savagely gnashing teeth.



Megapiranha Swarm

CR 6

XP 2,400
N Tiny animal (aquatic, swarm)
Init +6; Senses blindsense 30 ft., keen scent; Perception +6
DEFENSE
AC 17, touch 14, flat-footed 15 (+2 Dex, +3 natural, +2 size)
hp 76 (9d8+36)
Fort +9, Ref +10, Will +4
Defensive Abilities swarm traits
OFFENSE
Spd swim 40 ft.
Melee swarm (2d6 plus bleed and distraction)
Space 10 ft.; Reach 0 ft.
Special Attacks bleed (2d6), distraction (DC 17)
STATISTICS
Str 12, Dex 15, Con 17, Int 1, Wis 12, Cha 2
Base Atk +6; CMB -; CMD -
Feats Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, Skill Focus (Stealth), Step Up, Toughness
Skills Perception +6, Stealth +18, Swim +17
ECOLOGY
Environment any aquatic
Organization solitary, shoal (2-4 swarms), or school (5-7 swarms)
Treasure none
SPECIAL ABILITIES
Keen Scent (Ex) A megapiranha swarm can notice creatures by scent in a 180-foot radius underwater and can detect blood in the water at ranges of up to a mile.
